results.title: Acquired left-to-right shunting through a valve-incompetent foramen ovale in a cat with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and congestive heart failure
results.text_hl: Three years prior to presentation, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was diagnosed with @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@obstructive hypertrophic cardiomyopathy@@@ and started on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

results.title: The effect of atenolol on NT-proBNP and troponin in asymptomatic cats with severe left ventricular hypertrophy because of hypertrophic cardiomyopathy: a pilot study.
results.text_hl: ...BACKGROUND: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ often is used empirically in @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic cardiomyopathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@HCM@@@) before the onset of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, although evidence of efficacy is lacking.

citations.NLM: Jung SW, Kittleson MD. The effect of atenolol on NT-proBNP and troponin in asymptomatic cats with severe left ventricular hypertrophy because of hypertrophic cardiomyopathy: a pilot study. J Vet Intern Med. 2011 Sep-Oct;25(5):1044-9. PMID: 21781160

results.title: Effect of atenolol on heart rate, arrhythmias, blood pressure, and dynamic left ventricular outflow tract obstruction in cats with subclinical hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To investigate the negative chronotropic, antiarrhythmic, and obstruction-relieving effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ with subclinical @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic cardiomyopathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@HCM@@@).

citations.NLM: Jackson BL, Adin DB, Lehmkuhl LB. Effect of atenolol on heart rate, arrhythmias, blood pressure, and dynamic left ventricular outflow tract obstruction in cats with subclinical hypertrophic cardiomyopathy. J Vet Cardiol. 2015 Dec;17 Suppl 1():S296-305. PMID: 26776587

results.title: [Percutaneous transluminal septal ablation with ethanol in hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy: a case report].
results.text_hl: A 48-year-old man with @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy@@@ was treated by nonsurgical septal ablation.
